item.title: 古驰（Gucci）所有者开云集团（Kering）称遭到黑客攻击，被访问的数据有限
item.description: 开云集团（Kering SA）旗下的奢侈品牌包括古驰（Gucci）、圣罗兰（Saint Laurent）和巴黎世家（Balenciaga），该集团周一表示，它是 6 月份发现的数据泄露事件的受害者，这是消费品行业遭受的一系列攻击中的最新一起。【原文：Kering SA, whose luxury brands include Gucci, Saint Laurent and Balenciaga, said Monday it was the victim of a data breach that was discovered in June, the latest in a string of attacks on the consumer goods sector.】

item.title: 阿根廷抑制美元需求以遏制比索贬值
item.description: 阿根廷监管机构采取行动抑制金融市场对美元的需求，这是政府为防止比索在交易范围之外走软所做的最新努力。【原文：Argentine regulators moved to curb demand for dollars in the financial market, the latest government effort to prevent the peso weakening beyond its trading band.】

item.title: 美国统计局招聘 25 名兼职人员为消费物价指数收集价格信息
item.description: 劳工统计局正在为一项关键的通货膨胀指标招聘价格采集员，该指标越来越依赖于一种统计猜测方法来弥补人员流失。【原文：The Bureau of Labor Statistics is hiring price collectors for a key inflation metric that’s increasingly relying on a statistical guessing method to compensate for lost staff.】

item.title: 特朗普关于 "最低限度标准 "的决定导致奢侈品零售商 Ssense 倒闭
item.description: 据加拿大奢侈时装零售商 Ssense 向法院提交的破产保护案文件显示，对运往美国的小批货物免征关税的终止是该公司的最后一根稻草。【原文：The end of a duty exemption for small shipments to the US was the last straw for Canadian luxury fashion retailer Ssense, according to a court filing in the company’s bankruptcy-protection case.】

item.title: 比特币粉丝抨击数十亿美元抢购阿尔特币资产负债表的行为
item.description: 比特币纯粹主义者和另类币拥护者之间的冲突由来已久，现在正进入一个高风险的战场：企业-财政繁荣。【原文：A long-simmering clash between Bitcoin purists and altcoin advocates is reaching a high-stakes battleground: the corporate-treasury boom.】

item.title: 摩根大通与花旗就年底美国融资市场前景发生冲突
item.description: 鉴于近期隔夜借贷成本波动加剧，华尔街策略师对未来几个月美国融资市场是否会走软存在分歧。【原文：Wall Street strategists are at odds as to whether the US funding markets will soften in the months ahead, given the recent increased volatility in overnight borrowing costs.】

item.title: 华尔街对特朗普推动终止季度盈利发出警报
item.description: 半个多世纪以来，美国上市公司一直按季度报告盈利情况，但在周一清晨的社交媒体发帖浪潮中，唐纳德-特朗普总统再次引发了关于这一规定的长期争论。【原文：For more than half a century publicly-traded US corporations have reported earnings at quarterly intervals, but during an early-morning wave of social media posts on Monday, President Donald Trump reignited a long-standing debate over the requirement.】

item.title: 美国寻求增加用于核电的战略铀储备
item.description: 特朗普政府的最高能源官员表示，美国应寻求增加其战略铀储备，以缓冲俄罗斯的供应，并增强对核能发电长期前景的信心。【原文：The Trump administration’s top energy official said the US should look to boost its strategic uranium reserve to buffer against Russian supplies and increase confidence in the long-term prospects of nuclear power generation.】

item.title: 丹格特扩张尼日利亚帝国，在工会警告罢工之际为卡车运输提供燃料
item.description: 这位非洲首富已经开始用卡车将燃料从他的大型炼油厂直接运往零售商，将他的庞大帝国扩展到尼日利亚经济最关键的领域之一。【原文：Africa’s richest person has begun trucking fuel from his massive refinery directly to retailers, extending his sprawling empire into one of the most critical sectors of Nigeria’s economy.】

item.title: 德意志银行称，投资者削减美元敞口的速度创历史新高
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）对交易所交易基金的分析显示，海外投资者正在以 "前所未有的速度 "削减其美元敞口，因为他们在购买美国股票和债券时进行了货币对冲。【原文：Overseas investors are slashing their dollar exposure at “an unprecedented pace” as they put on currency hedges when buying US stocks and bonds, according to a Deutsche Bank AG analysis of exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 法国央行下调经济增长预期，警告政治风险
item.description: 法国央行下调了未来两年的经济展望，警告在政府再次垮台后，预算不确定性将带来下行风险。【原文：France’s central bank trimmed its economic outlook for the next two years, warning of downside risks from budget uncertainty following another government collapse.】

item.title: 对尼日利亚高收益债务的强烈追捧推动奈拉反弹
item.description: 尼日利亚奈拉创下了近七个月的新高，这主要是受石油出口收入增加以及在下周可能降息之前外国对当地债务市场提供的高收益率的需求提振。【原文：Nigeria’s naira hit a near seven-month high boosted by stronger oil export earnings and foreign demand for the high yields offered by the local debt market ahead of possible interest rate cut next week.】

item.title: 经济学家认为贸易战将使加拿大赤字激增至 700 亿加元
item.description: 分析人士预计，随着加拿大加大开支以加强军事和基础设施建设，总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）将使联邦政府的预算陷入更深的亏损。【原文：Analysts expect Prime Minister Mark Carney to push the federal government’s budget deeper into the red as Canada ramps up spending to bolster its military and infrastructure.】

item.title: 了解美元与股票的脱节
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 摩根大通凯利警告美联储缩表有可能损害股票和债券
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）首席全球策略师大卫-凯利（David Kelly）认为，如果人们认为美联储本周降息是受政治压力驱动，且与央行对经济的预测不一致，那么人们普遍预期的美联储降息将增加股票、债券和美元的风险。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s widely expected interest rate cut this week will increase risks for stocks, bonds and the dollar if it’s perceived to be driven by political pressure and doesn’t align with the central bank’s forecasts for the economy, according to David Kelly, chief global strategist at JPMorgan Asset Management.】

item.title: 长期债券扭亏为盈，迎来 2023 年以来最好的一个月
item.description: 随着投资者对美联储降息预期的增强，市政债务市场的长端最近从 2025 年艰难的开局中反弹。【原文：The long end of the municipal debt market has recently bounced back from a difficult start to 2025 as investors amp up their expectations for rate cuts from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: Dyna Robotics 从英伟达和亚马逊获得 1.2 亿美元融资
item.description: 致力于开发高性价比通用机器人的初创公司 Dyna Robotics 在新一轮融资中筹集了 1.2 亿美元，使公司估值超过 6 亿美元。【原文：Dyna Robotics, a startup working to develop cost-effective, general-purpose robots, has raised $120 million in a new funding round that boosts the company’s valuation to more than $600 million.】

item.title: 据称 Verisure 最快将于本周在瑞典首次公开募股 30 亿欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，赫尔曼-弗里德曼公司（Hellman & Friedman）旗下的报警器公司 Verisure 正在考虑最快于本周在斯德哥尔摩进行首次公开募股，这将拉开欧洲三年来规模最大的首次公开募股的序幕。【原文：Verisure, the alarm company owned by Hellman & Friedman, is considering launching an initial public offering in Stockholm as soon as this week, according to people familiar with the matter, kicking off what could be Europe’s largest IPO in three years.】

item.title: 与 Coinbase 链接的区块链正在探索一种新的加密货币
item.description: Coinbase Global 公司创办的公共区块链 Base 正在探索一种新的加密货币，此举有助于为其支持的项目筹集资金。【原文：Base, a public blockchain Coinbase Global Inc. started, is exploring a new cryptocurrency, a move that could help raise money for the projects it underpins.】

item.title: 非美国银行现金缓冲下降，显示储备不断减少
item.description: 非美国银行持有的现金资产减少，表明这些机构预期提供的缓冲储备正在减少。【原文：Non-US banks’ declining holdings of cash assets suggest that the buffer of reserves that these institutions were expected to provide is dwindling.】

item.title: 美国农业部报告看跌后，玉米从三个月高点回落
item.description: 玉米期货从三个月高点回落，抹去了上周五的大部分涨幅，因为交易商正在消化美国农业部发布的一份看跌报告，该报告预测玉米作物产量高于预期。【原文：Corn futures eased off a three-month high, erasing most of Friday’s gains as traders digested a bearish report from the US Department of Agriculture that forecast a bigger than expected corn crop.】

item.title: 加州石油合并将受益于油井许可热潮
item.description: 加利福尼亚资源公司（California Resources Corporation）将接管竞争对手贝里公司（Berry Corp），该公司将从州政府的立法中获益，州政府的立法将使钻井变得更加容易。【原文：California Resources Corporation, which is set to take over rival oil driller Berry Corp, stands to benefit from state legislation that would make it easier to drill.】

item.title: 谷歌广告技术出售要约远未达到司法部要求的分手条件
item.description: 谷歌的一位律师周一表示，谷歌曾考虑出售部分广告技术业务，以解决欧洲和美国的反垄断问题。【原文：Google considered selling off parts of its ad tech business to resolve antitrust concerns in Europe and the US, a lawyer for the company said Monday, but a Justice Department proposal to force the sale of its advertising exchange goes much further.】

item.title: 前利率制定者称英格兰银行应停止出售金边债券
item.description: 英国央行前利率制定者警告说，英国央行应停止出售其量化宽松投资组合中的金边债券，因为这种销售正在扭曲货币政策。【原文：The Bank of England should stop selling gilts from its quantitative-easing portfolio because the sales are distorting monetary policy, a former BOE rate-setter warned.】

item.title: 意大利正在起草向银行增资 15 亿欧元的计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）政府正在制定一项初步计划，通过推迟意大利贷款人的税收减免，在2027年从意大利贷款人那里额外筹集15亿欧元（18亿美元）。【原文：Giorgia Meloni’s government is working on a preliminary plan to raise an extra €1.5 billion ($1.8 billion) from Italian lenders in 2027 by postponing their tax deductions, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国车桥公司寻求 23 亿美元资助 Dowlais 收购案
item.description: 美国车桥制造公司（American Axle & Manufacturing Inc.【原文：American Axle & Manufacturing Inc. is looking to raise $2.3 billion in the US leveraged-finance market to help fund its acquisition of Dowlais Group Plc.】

item.title: 智利财政部长尼古拉-格劳誓言在 2026 年预算中限制支出增长
item.description: 智利新任财政部长表示，智利政府将在 2026 年严格控制支出，即使在智利 11 月即将迎来投票之际，财政支出的增幅也将低于往年。【原文：Chile’s government will keep a tight rein on spending in 2026, raising fiscal expenditure by less than in previous years even as the nation heads to the polls in November, the new finance minister said.】

item.title: 降息乐观情绪升温，铜价创 15 个月新高
item.description: 由于交易商为本周美国联邦储备委员会的降息预期做准备，并寻找今年晚些时候进一步宽松政策的线索，铜在更广泛的风险反弹中跳升至15个月高点。【原文：Copper jumped to a 15-month high in a broader risk-on rally, as traders prepared for an expected US Federal Reserve rate cut this week and looked for clues on further easing later in the year.】

item.title: 据悉，Advent 将在旗舰项目筹资中达到 200 亿美元的里程碑
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，自今年年初以来，收购公司 Advent 已为其旗舰基金募集到 200 亿美元资金，一反充满挑战的募资环境。【原文：Buyout firm Advent has raised $20 billion for its flagship fund since the start of the year, defying a challenging fundraising environment, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以色列通胀率自 2024 年 6 月以来首次达到目标
item.description: 以色列的年度通胀率在一年多的时间里首次回升至目标区间，但目前还不清楚决策者是否会认为这足以在本月晚些时候降息。【原文：Israel’s annual inflation inched back into its target range for the first time in over a year, although it’s unclear whether policymakers will consider it enough to cut interest rates later this month.】
